title: non-unicode friendly jcabi-http
body:
As soon as https://github.com/jcabi/jcabi-http/issues/1 is solved and released, let's try to fix the problem here:

```
canSearchForIssues(com.jcabi.github.RtSearchITCase)  Time elapsed: 0.753 sec  <<< ERROR!
java.lang.IllegalStateException: broken Unicode text at line #2 in '{\"total_count\":1657558,\"items\":[{\"url\":\"https://ap..92477..should be rejected.\",\"score\":1.0322446}]}' (92587 bytes)
    at com.jcabi.http.request.DefaultResponse.body_aroundBody8(DefaultResponse.java:143)
    at com.jcabi.http.request.DefaultResponse$AjcClosure9.run(DefaultResponse.java:1)
    at org.aspectj.runtime.reflect.JoinPointImpl.proceed(JoinPointImpl.java:149)
    at com.jcabi.aspects.aj.MethodLogger.wrap(MethodLogger.java:204)
    at com.jcabi.aspects.aj.MethodLogger.ajc$inlineAccessMethod$com_jcabi_aspects_aj_MethodLogger$com_jcabi_aspects_aj_MethodLogger$wrap(MethodLogger.java:1)
    at com.jcabi.aspects.aj.MethodLogger.wrapClass(MethodLogger.java:132)
    at com.jcabi.http.request.DefaultResponse.body(DefaultResponse.java:141)
    at com.jcabi.github.RtSearchPagination$SearchRequest$1.body(RtSearchPagination.java:169)
    at com.jcabi.http.response.AbstractResponse.body(AbstractResponse.java:90)
    at com.jcabi.http.response.JsonResponse.json(JsonResponse.java:95)
    at com.jcabi.github.RtValuePagination$Items.fetch(RtValuePagination.java:203)
    at com.jcabi.github.RtValuePagination$Items.hasNext(RtValuePagination.java:177)
    at org.hamcrest.collection.IsEmptyIterable.matchesSafely(IsEmptyIterable.java:15)
    at org.hamcrest.collection.IsEmptyIterable.matchesSafely(IsEmptyIterable.java:11)
    at org.hamcrest.TypeSafeMatcher.matches(TypeSafeMatcher.java:65)
    at org.hamcrest.core.IsNot.matches(IsNot.java:25)
    at org.hamcrest.MatcherAssert.assertThat(MatcherAssert.java:12)
    at org.hamcrest.MatcherAssert.assertThat(MatcherAssert.java:8)
    at com.jcabi.github.RtSearchITCase.canSearchForIssues(RtSearchITCase.java:66)
```
